item.title: 澳大利亚最大的几家银行出了什么问题？
item.description:
本周的澳大利亚播客：监管机构再次对银行交易展开调查，我们最大的几家金融机构究竟出了什么问题？【原文：

On this week’s Australia Podcast: As the regulator launches yet another probe into bank trading, what is going wrong at some of our biggest financial institutions?

】

item.title: Meta 挑选东南亚资深人士担任亚太区负责人
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司将提升其东南亚地区的长期负责人为亚太地区的最高业务主管，亚太地区是该公司的主要增长市场之一。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is elevating its longtime head of Southeast Asia to be its senior-most business executive for the broader Asia-Pacific region, one of its main growth markets.】

item.title: Cotality 称，澳大利亚 100 万澳元以上的住宅创历史新高
item.description: 澳大利亚是世界上最昂贵的房地产市场之一，根据咨询公司 Cotality 的研究，目前澳大利亚三分之一以上的住宅价值在 100 万澳元（约合 643850 美元）或以上。【原文：More than a third of homes in Australia, one of the world’s most expensive property markets, are now valued at A$1 million ($643,850) or more, according to research by consultancy Cotality.】

item.title: 信实集团获得 29 亿美元 2023 年以来最大一笔印度贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）拥有的信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）获得了一笔相当于 29 亿美元的双币种借款，这是一年多来印度最大的一笔离岸贷款。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries has obtained a dual-currency borrowing of $2.9 billion-equivalent, according to people familiar with the matter, the largest offshore Indian loan in over a year.】

item.title: 印度金属股成为中美贸易紧张局势缓和的受益者
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 恒瑞医药寻求在香港上市，融资额高达 13 亿美元
item.description: 江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司（Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co., Ltd.）已开始接受投资者的香港上市申请，此次上市可能会筹集多达 99 亿港元（13 亿美元）的资金，这是促进金融中心股票销售复苏的最新一笔重要交易。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. has started taking investor orders for a Hong Kong listing that could raise as much as HK$9.9 billion ($1.3 billion), the latest significant deal to boost the financial hub’s share-sale recovery.】

item.title: 据说星巴克将启动出售庞大中国业务股份的程序
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，星巴克公司已与私募股权投资公司、科技公司和其他公司进行了接触，以考虑其中国业务的各种选择，包括可能的股权出售。【原文：Starbucks Corp. has contacted private equity firms, technology companies and others as it considers options for its China business, including a possible stake sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行寻求重振对货币政策至关重要的融资市场
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，随着当局向贷款人倡导使用该市场，一个主要由印度银行使用的日渐萎缩的借贷市场正显示出生机勃勃的迹象。【原文：A dwindling borrowing market used mainly by Indian banks is showing signs of life as authorities champion its usage to lenders, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 房价下跌，香港顶级开发商数小时内售罄房屋
item.description: 香港最大的房地产开发商新鸿基地产有限公司（Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd.）一个新项目的首批住房在数小时内售罄，原因是两年多来最低的抵押贷款利率吸引了购房者。【原文：Hong Kong’s biggest property developer Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. sold out the first batch of homes for a new project within hours, as the lowest mortgage rates in more than two years lured buyers.】

item.title: 中国投资者发出信号：贸易停战不是市场的灵丹妙药
item.description: 在减少政策刺激的预期和最终协议的不确定性挥之不去的情况下，贸易休战还不足以引发对中国金融资产的抢购。【原文：The trade truce is not enough to ignite a rush into Chinese financial assets amid expectations of reduced policy stimulus and lingering uncertainty on a final deal.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 4 月就业岗位激增，货币在澳大利亚央行会议前上涨
item.description: 澳大利亚 4 月份的就业率飙升，而失业率则保持稳定，因为有更多的人在寻找工作，在储备银行预计进一步降低利率之际，这凸显了劳动力市场的韧性。【原文：Australian employment soared in April while the jobless rate held steady as more people sought work, highlighting the resilience of the labor market at a time when the Reserve Bank is expected to reduce interest rates further.】

item.title: 乐天集团股价下跌，季度亏损超预期
item.description: 日本电子商务公司乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.【原文：Rakuten Group Inc. shares tumbled after the Japanese e-commerce firm reported a 19th straight quarterly loss, fueling concerns about the financial drag from its ailing mobile business.】

item.title: 中国风险较高的短期公司债券利差降至创纪录水平
item.description: 中国央行最新的货币宽松政策引发了地方企业债券的新一轮反弹，随着投资者加大杠杆押注，风险溢价创下历史新低。【原文：The Chinese central bank’s latest monetary easing has triggered a fresh rally in local corporate bonds, sending risk premiums to a record low as investors ramped up leveraged bets.】

item.title: 降息可能性增大，菲律宾债券反弹时机成熟
item.description: 未来几个月，菲律宾主权债券可能会反弹，因为经济增长放缓和通胀放缓会增强进一步降息的理由。【原文：Philippine sovereign bonds may rally in the coming months as slowing growth and easing inflation boost the case for further interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: EToro IPO 使 Spark Capital 早期押注获得 5.3 亿美元收益
item.description:
这家风险投资公司在 15 年前首次投资了以色列 Robinhood 的竞争对手 。【原文：

The venture firm first invested in the Israeli Robinhood competitor 15 years ago.

】

item.title: 美联储降息预期减弱，避险需求减弱，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 由于有迹象表明美联储降息次数将少于此前预期，且中美紧张局势缓解削弱了避险需求，黄金在周三下跌超过2%后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied after falling more than 2% Wednesday on signs there will be fewer Federal Reserve rate cuts than previously anticipated, and as easing US-China tensions sapped haven demand.】

item.title: 在韩国举行的亚太经合组织会议上，贸易主管与格里尔争抢时间
item.description: 世界上一些最大经济体的贸易负责人将争相与美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔接触，因为他们本周将齐聚韩国参加会议，寻求推进与华盛顿的谈判。【原文：Trade chiefs from some of the world’s biggest economies will compete for access to US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer as they seek to advance negotiations with Washington when they gather this week for a conference in South Korea.】

item.title: 瑞银财富经理称日本富人仍担心日元崩溃
item.description: 由于特朗普的贸易战令市场惶惶不安，投机者和投资界大多对日元持乐观态度。但有一个关键的坚守者还没有做好看涨的准备：据一家全球财富管理公司称，日本最富有的国民对经济前景感到担忧。【原文：Speculators and much of the investing world have turned optimistic on the yen as Trump’s trade war keeps markets on edge. But there’s one key holdout that isn’t ready for bullishness: Japan’s richest citizens, worried about the economic outlook, according to a global wealth manager.】

item.title: 即使在美国发动贸易战之前，欧洲的外国投资也在下滑
item.description: 2024 年，一项衡量欧洲外国直接投资的指标降至九年来的最低点，这凸显了欧洲大陆在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战使经济前景黯淡之前，就已经在努力吸引企业。【原文：A measure of foreign direct investment in Europe sank to a nine-year low in 2024, underscoring the continent’s struggle to lure business even before US President Donald Trump’s trade war darkened the economic outlook.】

item.title: 亚马逊裁减 100 名设备团队员工，公司职位减少
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）将从其设备和服务部门裁撤约 100 个职位，该部门负责的产品包括 Alexa 语音助手和 Kindle 电子阅读器，这凸显了这家电子商务公司裁减员工的努力。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is eliminating about 100 positions from its devices and services division, which works on products including the Alexa voice assistant and Kindle e-reader, highlighting the e-commerce company’s efforts to trim its corporate workforce.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-科恩称美国经济衰退的概率目前为 45
item.description: 亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）表示，目前美国经济衰退的几率约为 45%。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen said the chance of a recession in the US now stands at about 45%.】

item.title: 香港投资银行职位出现回升迹象
item.description: 香港投资银行业的就业市场正显示出复苏的迹象，随着首次公开募股的反弹，这个金融中心的持牌专业人士数量也在不断上升。【原文：Hong Kong’s investment banking job market is showing signs of a recovery, with the number of licensed professionals in the financial hub ticking up as initial public offerings have staged a rebound.】

item.title: 亚洲股市开盘谨慎，反弹势头动摇：市场综述
item.description: 周四亚洲股市谨慎开盘，因为在中美贸易谈判引发风险资产大涨之后，华尔街出现了疲惫迹象。【原文：Asian equities were poised to open cautiously on Thursday as Wall Street showed signs of exhaustion following a surge for risk assets sparked by US-China trade talks.】

item.title: 美国原油库存骤增，原油连续第二日下跌
item.description: 在政府报告显示美国原油库存创下 3 月份以来最大单周增幅后，石油连续第二天下跌。【原文：Oil fell for a second day after a government report showed the weekly biggest build in US crude inventories since March.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称美国经济依然稳健，官员可保持耐心
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，美国经济的强劲表现让决策者们可以耐心等待特朗普政府的政策将如何影响企业和家庭的更多证据。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said the strength of the US economy allows policymakers to be patient as they wait for more evidence of how the Trump administration’s policies will affect businesses and households.】

item.title: 美国向沙特提供最先进的人工智能芯片的利害关系
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府改变了美国对中东两个石油富国的人工智能政策方向。这为沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国购买英伟达（Nvidia）公司和先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.在此之前，美国曾限制向该地区提供先进技术，并将其作为更广泛的人工智能软件和服务控制措施的一部分。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration has changed the direction of US AI policy toward two oil-rich states in the Middle East. It’s paved the way for Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates to buy chips from Nvidia Corp. and Advanced Micro Devices Inc. that are considered state-of-the-art when it comes to creating and running artificial intelligence software and services. Previously, the US had restrictions on delivering advanced technology to the region as part of broader controls on the sp】

item.title: 迫于投资者压力，上市子公司在日本遭 "封杀
item.description: 日本企业集团正在缩减其数百家上市子公司的规模，批评者认为这种结构往往不能很好地利用资本，而且会引发潜在的利益冲突。【原文：Japanese conglomerates are scaling back their hundreds of listed subsidiaries, a structure that critics say is often a poor use of capital and raises potential conflicts of interest.】

item.title: 为什么贸易协议和减税是美国成功的秘诀？
item.description:
在本周的特朗普经济学中，传统基金会的 斯蒂芬-摩尔（Stephen Moore）认为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和美国国会正走在正确的道路上。【原文：

On this week’s Trumponomics, Stephen Moore of the Heritage Foundation argues that Donald Trump and the GOP Congress are on the right path.

】

item.title: 为什么在美国上市的中国股票在特朗普的贸易战中面临被驱逐的风险？
item.description: 关税并不是中美贸易战中唯一值得关注的战场。进入华尔街的机会可能被用作谈判的杠杆，这使得近 300 家在美国上市的中国公司面临被美国证券交易所除名的风险。其中包括电子商务巨头阿里巴巴集团和 JD.com Inc.【原文：Tariffs aren’t the only battleground to keep an eye on in the trade war between the US and China. Access to Wall Street could be used as a lever in the negotiations, leaving almost 300 Chinese companies listed in the US at risk of being removed from American stock exchanges. That includes e-commerce giants Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. and JD.com Inc.】

item.title: 新世界面临永久债券赎回的最后决定期限
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.）的时间正在流逝，因为这家负债累累的香港建筑商必须决定是否在最后期限前赎回一笔永久债券，否则将引发该融资的利息成本上升。【原文：The clock is ticking on New World Development Co. as the indebted Hong Kong builder must decide whether to redeem a perpetual bond before a deadline that would trigger higher interest costs on the facility.】
